articles.title: Papers Support NDC's Proposals
articles.content:
Papers Support NDC's Proposals
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Papers here today carry commentaries in connection with the fact that the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK made crucial proposals to the south Korean authorities to open a wide avenue for mending the inter-Korean relations by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					 To reject foreign forces and adhere to the standpoint of By Korean Nation Itself is the fundamental principle to be maintained by the north and the south in solving the issue of national reunification, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Only when the Korean nation responsible for mending the inter-Korean ties pools the efforts, is it possible to open a wide avenue for carving out the destiny of the nation and expect fresh progress in the reunification movement.
					
					 Taking a practical measure of completely halting all hostile military acts against the other side under the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is the very timely proposal for defending national security and peace.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities want the detent and peace on the Korean Peninsula, they have no need to stage war drills in south Korea against the fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces.
					
					 Minju Joson notes that the crucial proposals of the NDC reflect the patriotic mind to prevent the danger of a war and nuclear disasters so as to save the destiny of fellow countrymen, improve the north-south ties and open the way of independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have the firm stand of independence to carve out the destiny of the nation by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation, they will surely respond to the NDC's proposals, it says.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the DPRK to carry out the above-said proposals, the papers say, adding that the south Korean authorities should fulfill their responsibility in keeping with the aspiration of the fellow countrymen and as required by the times.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Directing All Efforts to Farming
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Directing All Efforts to Farming
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial calls upon the whole party and country and all people to concentrate all their efforts on farming so as to hit without fail the target of agricultural production set by the Workers' Party of Korea this year.
					 This year is a meaningful one that marks the 50th anniversary of the theses on socialist rural question made public by President Kim Il Sung, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 This year the WPK set again agriculture as a major thrust of our effort in the struggle for economic construction and improvement of the people's standard of living, and advanced an important task to concentrate all efforts on farming so as to hit without fail the target of agricultural production. 
					
					 Agriculture is the lifeline for economic construction and the settlement of the issue of people's living. Only when the agricultural sector holds high the torch of innovations, is it possible to make a leap forward on all fronts of socialist construction. When the DPRK does farming well, it can raise a strong wind of new innovations in all sectors of the national economy and bolster up the military capability to be invincible.
					
					 It is the only way of settling the food shortage of the country to do farming well by its own efforts and bring about a decisive turn in the agricultural production.
					
					 We should concentrate all efforts on bringing about great innovations in this year's farming, fully confident that it is quite possible to settle the food problem without fail when we turn out with determination,
					
					 There is no goal unattainable as long as there are the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great Juche-based farming method and the agricultural workers remaining loyal to the WPK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for National Unity and Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for National Unity and Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article calls upon all compatriots in the north, the south and abroad to dynamically open a fresh phase of national reunification this year by their concerted efforts and through a nationwide patriotic struggle for reunification.
					 It is the firm stand and consistent policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to embrace and unite everyone who values the soul of the nation and loves the country and nation for national unity and reunification irrespective of ideology, social system, class and stratum, the article says and goes on:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address clarified that the DPRK would join hands with anyone who opts to give priority to the nation and wishes for its reunification, regardless of his or her past.
					
					 It is the urgent requirement of the prevailing situation that those who have been gripped with the narrow-minded conception of confrontation so far should subordinate everything to the great cause of national reunification and orientate towards it, boldly doing away with the conception.
					
					 It is a crime against the nation and reunification to pay no heed to the will and demand of the nation and stand in the way of the movement for national reunification, the long-cherished desire of the nation, while insisting on the partisan ism and interests only.
					
					 Whoever has the blood and soul of the Korean nation and even an iota of national conscience should face up to the times, awake from a nightmare as early as possible, and swim with the dynamic historic trend for the improvement of the inter-Korean ties and national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should boldly break with their past tainted by their acts against reunification and respond to the DPRK's proposals with the patriotic actions for reunification.

articles.title: Message Sent to Bereaved Family of Rev. Mun Ik Hwan
articles.content:
Message Sent to Bereaved Family of Rev. Mun Ik Hwan
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the National Reconciliation Council and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification Saturday sent a joint message to the bereaved family of Rev. Mun Ik Hwan on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 Even now deeply cherished in the minds of the fellow countrymen is Rev. Mun Ik Hwan who was greeting the new spring of independent reunification while chanting that "reunification is in the perfect tense" with burning patriotism that "the country is one from Mt. Paektu to Mt. Halla", the message said.
					
					 He is a proud son of the nation who never waited for the spring of reunification but worked heart and soul to bring earlier it as the pioneer of the times, and is now advancing with us shoulder to shoulder in the van of the fellow countrymen, it noted.
					
					 The message said that he is standing in the grand march of the fellow countrymen dynamically advancing toward the country to be reunified as one, and his desire for reunification will be surely realized along with the ardent aspiration of the fellow countrymen for reunification.
					
					 It extended the deep consolation to his bereaved family, praying for his soul.

articles.title: DPRK Cabinet Enlarged Plenary Meeting Held
articles.content:
DPRK Cabinet Enlarged Plenary Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- An enlarged plenary meeting of the Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea took place.
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju and members of the Cabinet.
					
					 Leading officials of the organs under the Cabinet, directors of its management bureaus, chairpersons of the provincial, city and county people's committees, the provincial rural economy committees and the provincial regional planning commissions, directors of the provincial food and essential goods production management bureaus and managers of major industrial establishments were present as observers.
					
					 The meeting discussed "On thoroughly carrying out the important tasks set forth by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address".
					
					 Pak Pong Ju made a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that last year the service personnel and people of the DPRK, closely rallied around Kim Jong Un, exalted the brilliance of the ideas and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, extraordinarily strengthened the political and ideological might of our revolutionary ranks and the capabilities for self-defence, achieved proud successes in the drives for building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living and took a big step forward for building a highly civilized socialist nation by creating the "Masikryong speed".
					
					 The meeting referred to the great advance made on all fronts for building a thriving socialist nation last year.
					
					 The production on all indices of products increased last year compared with the previous year: Production of Juche iron increased by 28 percent, cement 14 percent, iron ore 6 percent, electricity 4 percent and coal 3 percent. Many successes were achieved in implementing the state budget.
					
					 The meeting set forth tasks and ways to be fulfilled by the Cabinet this year.
					
					 The sectors of agriculture, construction and science and technology should hold the torch of innovations in the van and all the fields of national economy including the vanguard sectors and basic industrial sectors should make fresh innovations.
					
					 In order to raise a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts for building a thriving socialist nation, all officials should organize undertakings in a big way with absolute loyalty to the Party, a high sense of responsibility for their work and fervent zeal, and strive with unflinching perseverance to implement the Party's plans and intentions without fail.
					
					 A relevant decision was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Bulgarian FM Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Bulgarian FM Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Bulgarian Foreign Ministry headed by Petko Doykov, general director for Bilateral Relations, left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Giving Play to Mental Strength, Key to Making Innovations
articles.content:
Giving Play to Mental Strength, Key to Making Innovations
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, in his New Year Address said that the greatest potential for creation and innovation, the fundamental key to miraculous change, lies in giving play to the mental strength of all servicepersons and civilians.
					 Miracles depend on conscious and positive activities of popular masses.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime taught that the popular masses are the almighty being in the world.
					
					 The strength that helps work miracles in the revolution and construction lies in making the popular masses display mental strength.
					
					 The popular masses can create something out of nothing and turn impossibility into possibility, only when their inexhaustible mental strength is fully displayed. It was clearly evidenced by the history of socialist construction in the DPRK.
					
					 In the period of the great Chollima upswing, workers of the Kangson Steel Complex rolled 120 000 tons of steel at the blooming mill of 6 000-ton rated capacity and those of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex produced 270 000 tons of pig iron with the equipment of 190 000-ton rated capacity.
					
					 For 15 years from the start of the construction of Mansudae Art Theatre and Rakwon Street, Pyongyang witnessed the construction of several streets like Changgwang and Kwangbok and scores of modern edifices, including the Grand People's Study House and May Day Stadium.
					
					 Even when the country was in hard time in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, the army and the people were able to pave a way for bringing about the nation's prosperity by overcoming all sorts of trials and difficulties, as they were possessed of strong mental strength to carry on the revolution to the end.
					
					 With the mental strength and the spirit of devotedly carrying out the leader's instructions, soldier-builders successfully built many edifices last year, including the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Unha Scientists Street, Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club and the world-level Masikryong Ski Resort, thus ushering in a heyday of construction.
					
					 All servicepersons and civilians are fully determined to glorify this as a year of great creation and innovations by giving fullest play to the matchless mental strength under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Repressive Action Taken against Leading Members of Railway Trade Union in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repressive Action Taken against Leading Members of Railway Trade Union in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The puppet police of south Korea applied for a warrant of arrest for four leading members of the Railway Trade Union including the chairman of the Pusan Regional Headquarters of the union on Thursday, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 The police took this action on the charge that chairmen of the regional headquarters of the union were the leading members who spearheaded the strike. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is going evermore frantic with the repressive campaign, labeling the union's strike staged in protest against privatization a crime.

articles.title: Bird Flu Occurs in North Jolla Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Occurs in North Jolla Province, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred in Kochang County, North Jolla Province, south Korea, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 More than 20 000 ducks were culled, it said.

articles.title: Implementation of Generalissimos' Behests for Korea's Reunification Urged
articles.content:
Implementation of Generalissimos' Behests for Korea's Reunification Urged
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, in his New Year Address called for making fresh headway in the national reunification movement, true to the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 It is 20 years after President Kim Il Sung left his last autograph on a historic document concerning Korea's reunification. The autograph shows the undying feats of the President, who devoted all his life to the country's reunification.
					
					 He had worked heart and soul for national reunification till the last moments of his life, saying that the country's reunification would be the greatest gift to the Korean people.
					
					 He always cared much about the national reunification issue. He took the issue into consideration even when drawing up any state and party policy and guiding economic and external affairs.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il had wisely led the struggle for implementing the President's last instructions on national reunification, performing great exploits to be recorded in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 Through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities, he codified Kim Il Sung's undying exploits for national reunification by publishing such celebrated works as "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" and "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".
					
					 He formulated as the three charters for Korea's reunification the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme for great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. And he provided historic north-south summits in Pyongyang, at which the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted, ushering in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The great feats of the Generalissimos for national reunification are further shining under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His New Year Address reflecting the steadfast resolve and will for Korea's reunification serves as an inspiring banner arousing all the fellow countrymen to the nationwide reunification movement as it clarified the detailed tasks for bringing about a fresh progress in the movement this year.
					
					 It is a patriotic struggle related to the nation's destiny in the new century of Juche to implement the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the country's reunification.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should get closely united in the idea of By Our Nation Itself to open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year without fail.

articles.title: Delegation of U.S. Asia Society Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of U.S. Asia Society Leaves
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Asia Society of the United States led by Chairwoman Josette Sheeran flew back home on Saturday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Given Publicity Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Given Publicity Abroad 
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign media gave publicity to the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in the period between January 9 and 12. 
					 The full text or detailed gist of the New Year Address were given publicity by the internet homepage of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud and the Ethiopian newspaper Daily Monitor illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Pakistani newspaper Patriot also carried the gist of the New Year Address.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign magazine and newspapers praised supreme leader Kim Jong Un as a great man.
					 The January issue of the China Hong Kong magazine International Link carried a special write-up titled "Statesman with deep love for the people" accompanied with photos of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The magazine noted that the world community is deeply impressed by the ardent love and reverence of the army and people of the DPRK for Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Saying that his loving care for the people is the starting-point of his thinking and all activities, it underlined that the DPRK has registered great successes in its drive for improving the people's living standard as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspapers Bangla Times and Blits on January 4 edited articles praising the peerlessly great person's popular traits, illustrated with photos documenting the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer and the DR Congo L'Avenir carried articles titled "Kim Jong Un, rare leadership art" and "Fresh heyday of construction in the era of Kim Jong Un" on January 6 and 8.
					
					 The papers introduced the DPRK working eye-opening miracles thanks to the energetic dedication of a peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Egyptian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Egyptian Political Figure
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, issued a statement in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un on January 12.
					 He said:
					
					 We are deeply impressed to receive the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un and convinced of the final victory of the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's address is a great programme indicating the way for the Korean people to follow in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 We support the Korean people in their drive for carrying out the tasks set forth by the address.
					
					 We, convinced of bright future of the cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu, firmly believe that the red flag of Juche will flutter more vigorously despite the vicious moves of the imperialists and their followers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Russian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Russian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK made public a statement in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un on January 13.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his address referred to the fact that the party, army and people of the DPRK achieved shining successes in building a thriving socialist nation and defending socialism last year.
					
					 The Russian public has fully supported the behests of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on achieving the peaceful reunification of the country free from any interference of outsiders.
					
					 This year marks the 20th anniversary of the date when Kim Il Sung wrote his last signature on a historic document related to national reunification.
					
					 We have supported the foreign policy of the DPRK which has made positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with all the countries that are friendly to it and safeguard global peace and security and promote the common prosperity of mankind, and will continue to do so.
					
					 We wholeheartedly wish the Korean people fresh successes in their drive for building socialism under the unfurled banner of Songun.

articles.title: Pyongyang Introduced by Chinese Daily
articles.content:
Pyongyang Introduced by Chinese Daily
 Beijing, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily on January 14 carried a travelogue on the DPRK written by its delegation under the title "Fresh Scenery in every part of Pyongyang".
					 The article introduced the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, Ryugyong Health Complex and People's Open-air Ice Rink. It went on:
					
					 We could see fresh scenery wherever we went.
					
					 New structures and facilities sprang up in Pyongyang in recent years. 
					
					 The Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital was completed in 2012.
					
					 Among the patients we saw people from local areas including South Phyongan Province and South Hwanghae Province. They are given free treatment.
					
					 There are an open-air pool equipped with all sorts of slides and tanks and a comprehensive indoor pool at the Munsu Water Park.
					
					 The water park completed in October, 2013 has a gymnasium where all sports facilities and apparatuses are available.
					
					 The park is crowded with happy visitors.
					
					 The DPRK is providing the people with great well-being. We had an opportunity to visit apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 The Mirim Riding Club draws endless stream of visitors.
					
					 At the indoor riding-drill ground people enjoyed riding.
					
					 The paper edited photos introducing the Sonhung Foodstuff Factory, too.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion ampliada del pleno del Consejo de Ministros
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion ampliada del pleno del Consejo de Ministros
 Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion ampliada del pleno del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el premier Pak Pong Ju y otros miembros del gabinete.
					
					 En calidad de observador participaron los cuadros de los organismos adscritos directamente al CM, los titulares de Direcciones, los presidentes de los comites populares provinciales, urbanos y distritales, los comites provinciales de economia rural, los comites provinciales de planificacion local, los titulares de direcciones provinciales de Industria Alimentaria y de Articulos de Uso Diario y los gerentes de fabricas y empresas importantes.
					
					 La reunion discutio la agenda "Para materializar cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo".
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del premier Pak Pong Ju y hubo discursos.
					
					 Los oradores dijeron que en el ano pasado, el ejercito y pueblo de Corea, unidos firmemente en torno al Mariscal, glorificaron la idea y la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y fortalecieron considerablemente el poderio politico e ideologico de las filas revolucionarias y la capacidad de autodefensa nacional.
					
					 Al crear la "velocidad Masikryong", lograron exitos orgullosos en la lucha por construir una potencia economica y mejorar la vida del pueblo y dieron gran paso adelante en la construccion del pais civilizado socialista, precisaron.
					
					 La reunion refirio que en el ano pasado, se logro gran avance en todas las ramas de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					 En 2013, la produccion en especies se aumento notablemente en comparacion con el ano anterior, a saber, la produccion del hierro Juche se cumplio en 128 %; el cemento, 114 %; los minerales de hierro, 106 %; la electricidad, 104 %; el carbon, 103 %.
					
					 Igualmente, se obtuvieron muchos exitos en la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal.
					
					 Presento las tareas de este ano que corresponden al Consejo de Ministros y los remedios para cumplirlas:
					
					 Deben procurar que la agricultura, la construccion y el sector de las ciencias y la tecnica sean vanguardia en la marcha con la antorcha de innovaciones en alto y hacer grandes innovaciones en el sector priorizado, las industrias basicas, y las demas esferas de la economia nacional.
					
					 Para ello, con absoluta lealtad hacia el Partido, alto sentido de responsabilidad y gran entusiasmo, todos los funcionarios programaran ambiciosos proyectos y lucharan con teson para realizarlos hasta sus ultimas consecuencias, cumpliendo asi infaliblemente lo que el Partido se propone.
					
					 En la reunion fue aprobada la resolucion correspondiente.

articles.title: Entidades de RPDC recuerdan al pastor surcoreano Mun Ik Hwan
articles.content:
Entidades de RPDC recuerdan al pastor surcoreano Mun Ik Hwan
 Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 20o aniversario del fallecimiento del pastor surcoreano Mun Ik Hwan, el Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional y la direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria enviaron el dia 18 a nombre comun un mensaje a los familiares del difunto.
					  El texto recuerda que esta conservada todavia en el alma de la nacion coreana la imagen del pastor Mun quien luchaba por la reunificacion independiente gritando que "la patria es una sola desde el monte Paektu hasta el Hanna" y "la reunificacion esta en el modo perfecto",  y prosigue:
					
					 El es hijo orgulloso de la nacion, quien no espero sentado la reunificacion sino se hizo precursor de la epoca para adelantarla, y hoy esta presente tambien al frente de nuestras filas.
					
					 En el torrente de nuestra nacion hacia la patria reunificada, se encuentra tambien el pastor Mun Ik Hwan y su deseo se realizara sin falta al igual que la fuerte aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion.
					
					  El mensaje deseo gloria al difunto expresando profundo consuelo a sus familiares.

articles.title: Periodicos apoyan propuesta de Comite de Defensa Nacional
articles.content:
Periodicos apoyan propuesta de Comite de Defensa Nacional 
 Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Los periodicos coreanos publicaron este sabado los comentarios individuales de apoyo a la propuesta importante del Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enviada a las autoridades surcoreanas para mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion. 
					 El diario Rodong Sinmun senala que rechazar a las fuerzas extranjeras y mantener con firmeza la posicion de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" es el principio fundamental para la solucion del problema de reunificacion del pais, y continua:
					
					 Solo cuando los integrantes de la nacion, duenos de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, unan sus fuerzas, pueden forjar el destino de la nacion y lograr un nuevo avance en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					 En la situacion critica creada en la Peninsula Coreana, el CDN presento en el tiempo oportuno la propuesta para defender la seguridad nacional y la paz, o sea, tomar las medidas practicas de parar totalmente todas las acciones militares hostiles a la contraparte. 
					
					 Si desean el alivio de la tension y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana no deben introducir en el suelo surcoreano las fuerzas extranjeras ni desarrollar los ejercicios belicos contra la parte connacional. 
					
					 El periodico Minju Joson tambien afirma que la propuesta importante del CDN refleja la anhelo patriotico de salvar el destino de la nacion previniendo el peligro de guerra y los desastres nucleares, mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas con las fuerzas unidas nacionales y lograr la reunificacion independiente. 
					
					 Si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen la firme posicion independiente de salvar el destino de la nacion con las fuerzas unidas nacionales, aceptaran positivamente la propuesta importante del CDN. 
					
					 Los periodicos ratifican que es firme la voluntad de la RPDC de poner en practica la propuesta importante y apuntan que las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar conforme a la aspiracion de la nacion y a la demanda de la epoca.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a alcanzar la meta de produccion agricola de este ano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a alcanzar la meta de produccion agricola de este ano
 Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- En el editorial publicado este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun llama a todo el partido, todo el pais y todo el pueblo a concentrar las fuerzas en la agricultura para alcanzar sin falta la meta de produccion de cereales, presentada este ano por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					 Este ano se cumple el 50o aniversario de la publicacion de la tesis sobre el problema rural socialista en nuestro pais por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, recuerda el editorial y continua: 
					
					 Este ano, el PTC definio otra vez la agricultura como sector principal para la construccion economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo y presento la tarea de alcanzar sin falta la meta de cereales. 
					
					 La agricultura es la linea vital para la construccion economica y la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo.
					
					 Hay que avivar las llamas de innovaciones en la agricultura para registrar el auge en todos los frentes de la construccion socialista y en la economia nacional en conjunto y consolidar el poderio militar. 
					
					 Para resolver el problema alimentario del pais, no hay otro remedio mas que hacer bien la labranza y registrar el cambio decisivo en la produccion agricola. 
					
					 No hay la meta inconquistable mientras se cuenta con la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el gran metodo de cultivo Juche y los trabajadores agricolas fieles al PTC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun reitera voluntad de Kim Jong Un de reunificar la patria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun reitera voluntad de Kim Jong Un de reunificar la patria
 Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y ultramar deben librar unidos la lucha patriotica por abrir este ano la nueva fase en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					 Asi destaca el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 18 y continua:
					
					 Abarcar y agrupar, en aras de la gran unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria, a todos los que aprecian el espiritu nacional y aman al pais y la nacion, por encima de las diferencias de sus ideas, regimenes, clases y sectores, esto es la firme posicion y la invariable politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					 En su historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un expuso que la RPDC admitira a todos los que aprecian la nacion y desean la reintegracion, independientemente de su pasado, y tambien en el futuro, esforzara de modo activo por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 La situacion actual urge que hasta los cautivados de la estrecha concepcion conflictiva, se separen de esta y orienten lo todo al gran proposito de reunificar la patria.
					
					 Constituye un crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion impedir la reunificacion de la patria, deseo secular de todos los coreanos, haciendo vista gorda de la voluntad y demanda de la nacion e insistiendo unicamente en la doctrina e intereses fraccionales.
					
					 Todos los que tengan la sangre y el espiritu de la nacion coreana y la conciencia nacional, deben incorporarse a la corriente historica al mejoramiento de relaciones N-S y a la reintegracion territorial.
					
					 Hace falta que todos se separen de los antecedentes anti-reunificacion y emprendan la lucha practica por la reunificacion.
